name: Goodboy Galaxy: Chapter Zero
storyline: For the most dedicated secret-hunting players, your mission is to find Azure, a secret crossover character from the upcoming and beautiful indie platformer Orange Island. If you manage to find her and collect her friendship card, please let us know!
summary: Single planet demo of our exploration platform game for Game Boy Advance (and PC and Switch!) - thanks to a successful Kickstarter campaign the full game is now in development!
